arts.ttl: Performance against Man City shows why Inter are a proper Champions League contender
arts.sum: Serie A champions Inter gave Manchester City a serious run for their money at the Etihad yesterday. While they failed to win the game, it was a performance which seemed…

arts.ttl: Man United legend Peter Schmeichel brutally lays into Etihad atmosphere after Man City's goalless draw with Inter Milan
arts.sum: In a repeat of the 2023 Champions League final, City were frustrated by the Italian giants in their opening European match of the season as they failed to find a breakthrough.

arts.ttl: Man City 0-0 Inter: Player ratings as excellent Nerazzuri stifle Cityzens
arts.sum: There was hardly a grand sense of occasion inside the Etihad despite the presence of two of the competition's favourites, and Inter gave the City faithful little reason to ramp up the noise as they produced an excellent first half display. While his proactivity allowed City to break at times, Inter did have joy breaking down his side in the second half.

arts.ttl: Manuel Akanji hilariously reveals ONE issue with Man City's new Oasis-inspired away kit after Pep Guardiola's side debuted shirt in stalemate with Inter Milan
arts.sum: The legendary rock and roll band recently announced the group - led by City fanatic brothers Liam and Noel Gallagher - are getting back together and the club have got in on the action.

arts.ttl: Erling Haaland appears to give x-rated response to Francesco Acerbi after Inter star asked for TWO of City striker's shirts following Champions League draw
arts.sum: Haaland was kept quiet on a night in which he missed out on his 100th goal for the club but he was all smiles during an animated chat with Acerbi after the final whistle.

arts.ttl: Man City 0-0 Inter Milan PLAYER RATINGS: Which superstar had a night to forget? Who was almost flawless at the back? And how did Jack Grealish get on?
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola's side lifted the European Cup the last time the two teams met just 15 months ago. And the performance of the Italian champions showed their performance in Istanbul was not a one-off.

arts.ttl: Kevin De Bruyne a doubt to face Arsenal due to groin injury in draw with Inter
arts.athr: Jamie Jackson at the Etihad Stadium
arts.sum: City playmaker taken off in Champions League match Guardiola pleased with draw against Italian champions Kevin De Bruyne is an injury doubt for Manchester City’s showdown with Arsenal on Sunday after suffering what appeared to be a groin injury in the Champions League goalless draw with Inter at the Etihad Stadium. The Belgian was hurt when running in on goal and being challenged by Yann Sommer, the Inter No 1, during the first half, afterwards seeming to clutch his groin area. Following treatment De Bruyne continued until the break but was then taken off. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Man City left sweating on the fitness of Kevin De Bruyne after veteran star was taken off injured at half-time against Inter Milan... just four days before crunch Arsenal clash
arts.sum: Guardiola revealed that he was planning to substitute the Belgian regardless and is hoping for more clarity on his fitness concerns over the next 48 hours.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola coy over Kevin De Bruyne injury as Man City boss hails 'fantastic' team after Inter Milan draw
arts.sum: Premier League champions host Arsenal on Sunday in what could already be a title showdown

arts.ttl: Guardiola happy with Manchester City point against ‘masters’ Inter
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola was ‘very happy’ with a point against Inter in the Champions League, noting...
